summary: Twice is a popular South Korean girl group with nine members. They formed in 2015 on a TV show called *Sixteen* and quickly became famous in South Korea with hits like "Cheer Up" and "TT." The group also succeeded in Japan, breaking records and winning awards. Twice made history as the first female Korean group to top Billboard's World Albums and Digital Song Sales charts. They've sold millions of albums and had international hits like "The Feels," which charted in the US and UK. Their fun, catchy songs and dance moves have made them a global sensation.
title: Twice
